comments.body: these two statements don't use structural comparison, so they don't show anything useful about assignability wrt to privates. Use a base/derived type or two structurally identical types to show that.
Probably the best approach is to replicate existing tests for normal private properties.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@    ~
!!! error TS2322: Type 'C<string>' is not assignable to type 'C<number>'.
!!! error TS2322:   Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'number'.
    b = a;                                    // Error
    ~
